name: Beat & Flow: A Body Rhythm and Word Game
name_original: Beat & Flow: A Body Rhythm and Word Game
description:
Inspired by choreographed sequences of martial arts that are observed in both competitions and entertainment, Beats and Flow is a game that you play with a group of friends. To make a long story short, it basically involves you declaring your attacks at one another until only one of your is standing.

My submission for the Asian Martial Arts by Asian Game Dev Jam.
